def find_max_disparity(arr1, arr2, arr3):
    arr1.sort()
    arr2.sort()
    arr3.sort()
    min_val = min(arr1[0], arr2[0], arr3[0])
    max_val = max(arr1[-1], arr2[-1], arr3[-1])
    return max_val + min_val

    arr3.sort()
    min_val = min(arr1[0], arr2[0], arr3[0])
    max_val = max(arr1[-1], arr2[-1], arr3[-1])
    return max_val * min_val
